message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $140. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it. However, I'm looking to spend closer to $130. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand you're looking to spend closer to $130, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. What do you think?
